title: Preferred social login ID worldwide 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of logins in the y axis.
Platform Facebook has the highest Share of logins and Live has the lowest Share of logins.
The Share of logins of Platform Live is 482.73% smaller than the maximum value at Facebook.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of logins for 7 number of Platforms.
The Share of logins is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Live.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of logins in the y axis.
Platform Facebook has the highest Share of logins and Live has the lowest Share of logins.
The Share of logins of Platform Live is 482.73% smaller than the maximum value at Facebook.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of logins for 7 number of Platforms.
The maximum Share of logins 53.1 is found at Platform Facebook and the minimum is found at Live where Platform is 0.11.
The second highest Share of logins is appeared to be the Platform GooglePlus.
There is a difference of 52.99 between the maximum Platform Facebook and minimum Platform Live.
Share of logins at Platform Facebook is 53.1 , second place is GooglePlus at 44.8, and thirdly is Twitter at 1.01.
The average Share of logins in all 7 Platforms is 14.29.
The Share of logins is 100.02 if we add up values of all Platforms.
